This document will be used to access the appropriate LAS files that are held in the Google Drive folder.

```{r}

# Load libraries
library(googledrive)

```

Now, we can download the file(s) to our specified directory

```{r}

drive <- file.path() # 
drive_las <- file.path()
dl_dir <- file.path("./01_download_raw")
dir.create(dl_dir, showWarnings = FALSE)

drive_download(drive_las, dl_dir)

```
